definition: L-Glutamate + 8-Carboxy-8-demethylriboflavin 5'-phosphate + H2O + 2 Acceptor <=> 2-Oxoglutarate + 8-Amino-8-demethylriboflavin 5'-phosphate + CO2 + 2 Reduced acceptor
comment: a part of three-step reaction (see R11960, R11961+R11962+R11963)
